analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Categories of States, in the Triad-based Numerical Series
The Section on Ripening🔽A state that is ripening is related to a state that is ripening as a root-cause condition …

original: Navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….🔽Navipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe  na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe
translated: A state that is a mental concomitant of ripening is related to a state that is a mental concomitant of ripening as a root-cause condition …

analyzed: na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
translated: A state that is neither ripening nor a mental concomitant of ripening is related to a state that is neither ripening nor a mental concomitant of ripening as a root-cause condition. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā bāttiṁsa, ārammaṇe sattavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnatiṁsa …pe… aññamaññe tiṁsa …pe… purejāte catuvīsa, āsevane sattarasa …pe… vipāke pañcavīsa …pe… avigate bāttiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā bāttisa ārammaṇe sattavīsa adhipatiyā ekūnatisa pe aññamaññe tisa pe purejāte catuvīsa āsevane sattarasa pe vipāke pañcavīsa pe avigate bāttisa
translated: In the case of root-cause, there are thirty-two; in the case of object, twenty-five; in the case of predominance, twenty-nine; in the case of support, twenty-nine; in the case of proximity, twenty-nine; in the case of antecedence, twenty-four; in the case of consequence, twenty-four; in the case of dissociation, twenty-four; in the case of presence, twenty-four; in the case of non-disappearance, twenty-four; in the case of nutriment, seventeen; in the case of faculty, twenty-four; in the case of path, twenty-four; in the case of association, twenty-four; in the case of presence-absence, twenty-four; in the case of dissociation-absence, twenty-four; in the case of opposition, twenty-four; in the case of non-opposition, twenty-four; in the case of ripening, twenty-five; in the case of karma, twenty-four; in the case of kamma-result, twenty-four; in the case of nutriment-kamma-result, seventeen; in the case of karma-result-nutriment, seventeen; in the case of karma-result-nutriment-kamma, seventeen; in the case of karma-result-nutriment-kamma-result, seventeen; in the case of karma-result-nutriment-kamma-result-nutriment, seventeen; in the case of karma-result-nutriment-kamma-result-nutriment-kamma, seventeen; in the case of karma-result-nutriment-kamma-result-nutriment-kamma-result, seventeen; in the case of karma-result-nutriment-kamma-result-nutriment-kamma-result-nutriment, seventeen; in the case of karma-result
